thread.title: David Bailey
thread.title_full: Low Cost Funeral reviewed by David Bailey

author: David Bailey
title: David Bailey
text:
All the guests commented on My Mother's send off descrbing it as 'beautiful' and 'a fitting service'.
I was able to easily design the service over the phone and through emails, setting the tone and pace I required and including chosen projected images of my Mother with her choice of classical music.
My Mother wanted a non-religious service and this was made easy to arrange with the removal of religious icons etc. and a Humanist Celebrant.
